18.heading: Caz.
18.title: "Collared for Love"
18.author: Caz
notes: Summary: A woman has a policeman catch a man who lifted her dress and ran away, then hugs the miscreant.

19.heading: Caz.
19.title: "Dope Bust Bust"
19.author: Caz
notes: Wordless sequence of nine drawings, in which two people using a water pipe are interrupted by a policeman, both reveal they are undercover police, and all three continue smoking.

20.heading: Caz.
20.title: "Native Bearers"
20.author: Caz
notes: Wordless sequence of four drawings, in which a White man in a helmet instructs two Black men to put their burdens in his car, and then to pick up the car and carry it on their heads.

21.heading: Caz.
21.title: "Toilet Training"
21.author: Caz
notes: Wordless sequence of 12 drawings in which a woman shows a child how to pull the chain on a European-style water closet, and then flushes the child.

22.heading: Caz.
22.title: "Underdress"
22.author: Caz
notes: Wordless sequence of 9 drawings, in which a man looks under a woman's dress, and then reports her to the police for undressing.

Saive, Philippe Touboul, and Yvan Delporte.
